code: import _toConsumableArray from"/home/kenstate/Desktop/client/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{WHISHLIST_ADD_PRODUCT,WHISHLIST_REMOVE_PRODUCT}from"../actions/types";export default function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var product=action.payload;switch(action.type){case WHISHLIST_ADD_PRODUCT:var exist=false;state.forEach(function(e){if(e._id===product._id){exist=true;}});if(exist){return state;}else{return[product].concat(_toConsumableArray(state));}case WHISHLIST_REMOVE_PRODUCT:state=state.filter(function(e){return e._id!==product._id;});return state;default:return state;}}
